content.detailedDescription: I had just dropped my wife off at the house and was running my friend dave home, he lives in foxfire apts. i dropped my buddy off and was stopped at the light at llyod expressway, heading south to north, just as i crossed the intersection there it was, at first i thought it was an airplane as it approached it gentle turned to about a 30 degree. at thids point it was very close to me, it really caught me off guard my god i wish i could have taped it or filmed the object. this babt was big and it seemed to just glide the super bright light rods on the craft i counted 6 were briliant and luminated in a distint pattern as it banked and changed directions no more than a couple hundred fee off the ground, less than a couple hundred yards right in front off me. i could see it plane as day. this object had some serious mass to it, it made no sound and had no visible emissions trail. it flew low and stayed low what belew my mind is as it faded out of site it stopped did a quick dazzle and disappeared in the distance twards mt.Vernon in. it was no helicopter  or plane it was amazing icannt get it out of head where did it come from and what was it doing?
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was heading straight at me very low from north to south 500 yds turnedon its side hovered headed due west very bright smooth lightning white rods hues of red into distance stopped twinkled and flashed pulsating faded out heading twards mt.Vernon, india

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I first seen the object in 2009 after i was leaving a friend house gettin a tattoo. i looked up in the sky & seen a blinking light the size of a quarter & i thought it was a star. but i thought about it & i told myself stars aint that big but i decided 2 let it go. but i just kept on seeing it... i have seen up to11 of them... they hover around every single day silently for 2 years now like they are plotting in something.... but u guys can give me a call & i can explain a whole lot of more details & if you guys can come out here you can see for yourself... i can show u all they setup points & fly around spots. i see them through my binoculars i even seen an invisible one. it flew over my head in broad day light on my,way 2 work. at first it was a glowin light from a distance just hovering but then it started to fly over me thats when u noticed it was 2 blinking lights on a invisible shell.. it was invisible in the light but u can still see.  please call me (216)956-4144 thank you im ready to prove everybody wrong because i didnt use to believe now im a believer because my eyes dont lie & neither do my family & friends eyes lue either
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Huge triangles with red lights that change random colors when,stationary

content.detailedDescription: Observed several orange-red starlike objects in the western sky. approximately 7+ objects moving slowly in a southern direction (almost stationary). apprximately 5 in a straight line and others were lower in the skyline. these lights appeeared to shift colors slightly from a reddish to orange tint ( very bright in the night sky). no sound observed, and objects began to fade out from the position they were in and vanished completely. the event occurred at 0015hrs on 12jan01, no further sightings observed the rest of the morning.
content.summary: Several large bright (orange-red) starlike objects moving slowly

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to look at new year's fireworks. they were not by any other fireworks, isolated near the horizon. orange fire in the sky, because there were about 3-4 of them. they would slowly appear and disappear and sort of float in the same area. at one time, they made a line of three, and the two on the sides swung down to make a triangle. then, they went back to a random formation and zipped up into the sky leaving a trail, almost as if a shooting star. they were there for about 8 minutes until they would start disappearing with none to fill-in. in awe, starting calling friends. they disappeared or faded into the sky.
content.summary: Appearing and disappearing orange/red dots in the sky. made triangles and lines.

content.detailedDescription:
Eastern pa - standing outside bsing with neighbors after midnight - had three lights come over one after the other traveling on a heading of about 110 degrees. (nw to se)

was an orange light - looked to be moving more like a satellite than an airplane - i'm usually pretty good at iding aircraft - this had no strobes or nav lights, just an orange glow.


had one come over, a few seconds later a second - then a third.... could have been an iridium flare but, i've never seen three in a row.... none predicted for the time (or any other passes that are known).



not moving overly fast (meteor - i've seen a bunch of those) and i'm 100% sure it wasn't an aircraft - the third one looked to "burn out" but, the shape was still easily made out in the sky for a bit....
content.summary: Three orange lights moving in a direct line ne to sw over southeast pa

content.detailedDescription: Lasted 6 minutes. camera could not pick up orbs. three orbs, moments later 10 orbs. moved positions, made a triangle, flickered in and out.  shot up and zig zag in the sky. then just disappeared.
content.summary: Orange orbs near camelback mountain

content.detailedDescription:
At about 12:10 am my nephew received a phone call from one of his friends to go outside and look at the sky, to which he did, a few seconds later he comes running in the house yelling for us to go outside (we were having a new years party) we followed him and sure enough we (including myself) observed 4 glowing orbs, which at first it appeared to be one of those paper balloons with the candle in them, but they were too bright, also one of them sort of hoovered for a second or two them ascended a few feet and proceeded to follow the others, going from northwest to southeast, i ran in the house to grab my camera, but by the time i got back outside the last one of the orbs was getting behind a building and i lost view. 
in total there were 11, 6 that my nephew saw traveling in formation, 4 that i saw, and one more after i went back outside.
i just wish i had my camera ready.
content.summary: Several red/orange glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription: It was new years and i went outside to look at some fireworks i had been hearing and i saw what first looked like a bright red firework, but it never blew up. then i noticed two other red balls of light. they seemed to move across the sky in a starit line and maintained a constant pace, and gaining alititude untill they were to high up to see. happy new years!
content.summary: Bright red lights above pikes peak

content.detailedDescription: It was new years and i went outside to look at some fireworks i had been hearing and i saw what first looked like a bright red firework, but it never blew up. then i noticed two other red balls of light. they seemed to move across the sky in a starit line and maintained a constant pace, and gaining alititude untill they were to high up to see. happy new years!
content.summary: Bright red lights above pikes peak

content.detailedDescription: Looking west while walking my dog with two friends when we viewed s huge bright green fireball flying north.  i alerted my friends of the anomaly  it then faded to reveal a slightly shiny v-shaped object that drifted off in another direction and we lost sight of it.  the object seemed to descend but when the green light faded it seemed to start flying level without slowing at all.
content.summary: Bright green streaking light like a shooting star. faded to reveal v shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving from a nye gathering with a large group of people shortly after midnight, yes, sober, mix of adults and children. one fella pointed up on this particularly clear night and said "look at that!" we all saw orange-red 'fireball's" coming over the treetops in a perfect line, faster than an airplane or a helicopter, but slow enough it looked deliberate. at first we saw two, then a third and a fourth. they sped their way from the south headed northwest and we ran up a small hill for a better view, two of us pulled out our phones trying to capture this, but nothing would show on the screens. one guy yelled for another adult to come out to watch. the fourth ball of light bobbled in a short up& down fashion. as they crossed our viewing area, the third ball seemed to wane in color and eventually disappear from sight. when we thought they had all passed, maybe a minute had gone by, two more came from exactly the same direction- heading in the same direction. it was commented as odd that their flight pattern was so close, low and without a single sound! since we were leaving anyways, i got in my car and drove to the very top of the ridge, that is all farm land and pulled over to watch the last two fly overhead (as the visibility stretched probably 20miles in that direction.. tho as the third ball had done, the last two disappeared from sight. i felt queasy and like my body siddenly weighed 10x's more than ot does, & my son immediately complained of a major headache and started vomiting within the next 10minutes. there were about 10 of us that witnessed this. cool stuff. (((happy new years!)))
content.summary: 6 fiery balls moving in a line across the sky moving northwest

content.detailedDescription: I was outside getting some fresh air and i noticed a glowing ball flying in the sky.When i first saw it i thought it was a meteor.It was glowing and it was traveling in a straight line heading southeast.I was shocked and scared when i saw it and after.I lost sight of it because it flew far away.
content.summary: Glowing orb that traveled in a straight line heading southeast

content.detailedDescription: I was outside getting some fresh air and i noticed a glowing ball flying in the sky.When i first saw it i thought it was a meteor.It was glowing and it was traveling in a straight line heading southeast.I was shocked and scared when i saw it and after.I lost sight of it because it flew far away.
content.summary: Glowing orb that traveled in a straight line heading southeast

content.detailedDescription: I was outside getting some fresh air and i noticed a glowing ball flying in the sky.When i first saw it i thought it was a meteor.It was glowing and it was traveling in a straight line heading southeast.I was shocked and scared when i saw it and after.I lost sight of it because it flew far away.
content.summary: Glowing orb that traveled in a straight line heading southeast

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to get some fresh air
it was flying in the sky glowing
a fireball and i called my family outside and my aunt got a video of it on her phone
it was round glowing and it was going in a straight line
shocked and scared
it flew away
content.summary: Glowing orb that made no sound and was traveling southeast and was followed by a helicopter five minutes after

content.detailedDescription:
White egg shape orb traveling toward the bay very left side of u.S.101 as my car was traveling south this object caught my eye.
the orb color was a weird off white gray.
content.summary: Driving south on u.S.101 left of freeway saw white egg shape orb traveling to coast

content.detailedDescription:
I was over at few friends of my family. we were outside playing pool. i seemed to be the only one to notice this object everyone else was to busy to notice anything. i was not drinking on new years. there had to be more than one person to see it in the tampa area not just me. i looked to the south-southwest about 170-176 degrees and saw an starlike object just barley over the treetops. first i thought i was seeing things because i just got off work and i was tired. so i rubbed my eyes a few times and it was still there. slowly but barley hovering to left and right. also up and down. it was twinkling white blue and green. it moved up higher behind the treeline later on. it was there for two hours in that general vicinity. i looked towards the south west and saw another star like object twinkling in a amberish/red color it was doing the same things.

there were inbound aircraft in the area but they did not move or look like this object did
content.summary: Two twinkling starlike objecting hovering over tampa,fl newyears eve

content.detailedDescription:
While driving towards the city of clearlake on hwy.53 observed two sets of three red orange lights moving in a north north west direction. pulled over because they seemed fairly low and to see if i could hear what it was by the time i pulled over and got out i only saw one, and two to three seconds later saw the second one pull up from behind a hill and climb up past the first one. that object continued to climb until it faded from view (appx. 1 min. later) the first one maintained its original course and eventually climbed (not as steeply) until it was out of sight. they were visible for appx. 7 min. and i never heard any sounds from them (traffic on highway was fairly light).

i called my wife to have her look from clearlake oaks and she said she observed them for appx 18 minutes. i'm retired military, have worked on aircraft for several years and i can't tell you what i was looking at!
content.summary: Two red/orange sets of lights in triangular arrangement going n-nw

content.detailedDescription:
228 coventry road: i was coming back from a new years eve party. i was getting out of the car to go inside (in the passenger seat), and when i looked out my passenger side window, there it was. i yelled for my mom to look because she was getting out of the car as well. we both darted behind the car, and stood in our drive way completely mesmerized by the motionless, hovering, ball of red light. after about 5 or 10 second of watching, the hovering ball of light slowly lowered. it didn't zig zag or anything, simply just lowered. the second it began to lower, the quiet neighborhood all at once became loud with every single dog barking. it was so weird because they all started barking at the exact same time, when it started lowering. it was like it was rehearsed. it went below the trees after about 15 or so seconds of watching it. since i couldn't see the light anymore, i ran inside and immediately called my boyfriend to see if he could see it (he was on iroquois road)and he went outside and said yes, he could see it. he told me it was red, pretty small and looked like a glowing red star (which is odd because it was huge when my mom and i saw it) and he said it was going up at an extremely fast pace. he told me he lost sight, but said he'd keep an eye on it, and i never heard anything more of him.

i've spent so many hours of my life watching alien shows,and i never thought i would actually be the one entering my report to mufon myself. this is a sighting i will never forget. it's changed my life.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Saturn-like,   Sphere
content.summary: Glowing red ball of light that hovered, then went down slowly.

content.detailedDescription: We witnessed similar orbs as in antioch ca. we are west of antioch and they appeared to be heading west towards the pacific ocean. they seemed to be glowing and changing their height . after 5 or so minutes they appeared to blink and they where gone.
content.summary: 3 orbs spotted

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home at night at about 8:15pm, going about 35mph, and was slowing to stop at a red light.  i was the first car in my lane with two vehicles on either side of me.  as i slowed to a stop my passeger abruptly asked "whats that?" i immediately spotted the greenish white object sailing through the sky going north.  the object appeared to be comet like, in that it had a tail.  the object emitted a glow around itself that was brighter than all the objects around it.  i was facing west as i witnessed the object moving north.  the object traveled about 1/4 of a mile north (from when i spotted it) and then it turned west, with the tail curving as well.  the movements of the object were smooth and precise.  the object, which was traveling incredibly fast, made no noise.  after the object turned west i watched it as it faded from sight in the distance.  the object was about 400 ft in front of me and was about 200 feet in the air.  the object, in reference to street lights, was big because it was the same size as the streetlight (which i was about 3 car lengths away from) even though the object was about 400 feet away from the light.  while i was watching the object i thought for a moment that it could be a missile of some sort, but the object was round, glowed greenish white, and made no noise.  my feelings while watching the object were somewhat astonishment and surprise.  i did not feel scared, or experience paralysis. i have seen many planes and helicopters, but this object was like nothing i have ever seen before.
content.summary: Green/white ufo traveling north at an impossible speed and then turned direction to go west where it flew from sight.

content.detailedDescription: While working at the above location, just happened to look up before going inside and observed 2 constant glowing red spheres traveling in a west to east direction. made no sound, had no flashing lights, had no green or white lights, just a steady red light. objects were observed for about a minute till they went out of sight.Knew it was not a helicopter and never seen any type of aircraft like this.
content.summary: Observed 2  oval craft with  constant red lights flying in tandem going west to east.

content.detailedDescription: I was talking to my daughter on the phone around 9 p.M. on june 3, 2011.  i was sitting sideways on my sofa and looking out the large window in my living room.  the moon was in the left upper side of the window, the sun had just set and there were those silvery, grayish clouds that seem to follow the sunset.  our house is across the road from a small lake and i was looking at the moon, the sky and the water.  please note that it was still daylight and the sky was blue above the sunset.  suddenly from the upper left corner of the window came an object that i instantly thought was the entire nose cone and part of the body of a jet that was falling from upper left to lower right.  i quickly realized that the cylindrical back part was flat and not broken off from a larger part as i had thought.  i yelled out to my daughter on the phone that i had to hang up.  i waited for it to crash either into the hill behind the back of the lake or crash into the lake itself.  i braced myself for an enormous explosion.  all at once it disappeared into thin air.  i could not believe my eyes.  i called our local radio station to no avail.  i eventually reported it to an airport 65 miles away.
content.summary: Thought it was the front of a jet coming down from the sky...Waited for it to crash in our little lake and it completely disappeared.  unbelievable!

content.detailedDescription: Review video footage attached below, self-explanitory
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Three bright orange orbs and one white orb dancing all over the place

content.detailedDescription: i was on the front porch of my home facing west looking at the stars when i heard a quiet "whooshing" sound, as i started to turn to look south where the sound was coming from i observed a very bright light moving perfectly horizontal east to west at a moderate to fast speed. i felt scared of what i had just seen so i told my wife about it and she went out side to see if she could see anything, all she observed was what appeared to be a smoke trail. i lost sight of the object when it disappeared, it did not fade it just disappeared.
content.summary: Large white light with "whooshing sound" traveled east to west for some distance

content.detailedDescription: One large light move up from horizon and sit stable in air. several orange lights move up from horizon and take different paths. some in formation hover and drop back down . some in formation move in changing paths and than move off into space. more come over horizon hang around than move off into space or back down under horizon. after about 20 minuets the main white light sunk behind horizon. i was recording these events from the front door of my house on a cell phone. i was taking out the garbage when i noticed the lights in the sky. these were not airplanes. i live near a flight path and more than once a commercial airliner flew thru the shot confirming these were not airplanes.
content.summary: Orange lights flying about not airplanes

content.detailedDescription: I was looking up at the stars with my father and looking at stars. it was new years eve and a bright orange light came and moved very fast, it stopped and was hovering for a brief time. then it shot up with a orange streak. it then move away and dissappeared in the night sky.
content.summary: Bright orange light that moved fast the slowed down then came to a brief stop. then it shot up with a streak of orange. then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i witnessed what appeared to be red-orange fireball-like objects fly over our neighborhood in oviedo, fl during our christmas eve party sometime around 9:45pm-10:00pm. the object was first seen by a family member who happened to spot the objects coming over the backyard of the house. as time went on more family members rushed out to see the objects which by then were flying over the front of the house by which time one object had turned away and gone out of sight. the other continued in a southeasterly path losing sight of as it near the forest in the horizon. the red-orange fireball object was completely different from aircraft sighted in the sky around the same time. my brother, an aircraft mechanic and i, an aerospace engineering student discussed the sighting and where unable to identify the object. the object was also away from the side of sky where cape canaveral launches can be seen, and there where no rocket launches scheduled for that night. no sound could be heard from the objects, it was like nothing we've ever seen before.
content.summary: Fireball-like object seen on christmas eve

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from a friends house. then i just happened to be looking at the sky and i saw a blue white diamond shape over my neighbors house. i was very young so i didn't know what to make of it i just stood there scared to death. it was a blue white glowing diamond just hovering there. after maybe a minute i recovered and ran inside then after 2 minutes of being inside i looked out the window and it was gone.
content.summary: A blue diamond over my neighbors house when i ran inside i looked out the window it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
Mid-afternoon, sunday, august 24, 2008. while heading eastbound on hawkins academy road, looking north across high-voltage powerlines going through trees. 1/10 mile saucer-shape, square openings at equater. equilateral saucer. sporadic clouds. perfect military desert color. north-west of hard labor creek state park. silent. probably slightly west of intersection browning shoals rd./social circle fairplay rd. paritioners in doorway at willow springs baptist church looked nervous.

unusual low white sikorski s-76 out of social circle heliport, months before.
content.summary: Rutledge, georgia/sunday, august 24, 2008
